com.opengamma.strata.calc.runner.function.result

Class SingleScenarioResult<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opengamma.strata.calc.runner.function.result.SingleScenarioResult<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the result
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CurrencyConvertible<ScenarioResult<?>>, ScenarioResult<T>, Serializable, Bean, ImmutableBean

    public final class SingleScenarioResult<T>
extends Object
implements ScenarioResult<T>, CurrencyConvertible<ScenarioResult<?>>, ImmutableBean, Serializable
    A scenario result holding one value that is valid for all scenarios.

    This contains a single value where the same value is the result of each scenario. The calculation runner will not attempt to convert the currency of the value.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Obtains an instance from a single result and scenario count.

        The single result is valid for each scenario.

      • size

        public int size()
        Description copied from interface: ScenarioResult
        Returns the number of values in the result.

        This is required to be the same as the number of scenarios in the market data provided to the function.

        Specified by:
        size in interface ScenarioResult<T>
        Returns:
        the number of results

      • stream

        public Stream<T> stream()
        Description copied from interface: ScenarioResult
        Returns a stream of the values.

        The stream will return one value for each scenario.

      • convertedTo

        public ScenarioResult<?> convertedTo(Currency reportingCurrency,
                                     CalculationMarketData marketData)
        Description copied from interface: CurrencyConvertible
        Returns a copy of this object with any currency amounts converted into the reporting currency.

        Each currency amount in the object will be converted to the specified currency. Any object that is not a currency amount will be left unchanged.

        The supplied market data is scenario aware. If this object is also scenario aware, then the FX rate used to convert each value may be different. In that case, the market data must have the same number of scenarios as this instance.

        Specified by:
        convertedTo in interface CurrencyConvertible<ScenarioResult<?>>
        Parameters:
        reportingCurrency - the currency into which all currency amounts should be converted
        marketData - the multi-scenario market data containing any FX rates needed to perform the conversion
        Returns:
        a copy of this result with any currency amounts converted into the reporting currency
